data.name: Binary Syndrome
data.detailed_description:
"Binary Syndrome" is a PC-98 respect command-click android counseling ADV.



The year is 2101, in a near future where the line between man and machine is fading.

A disease is discovered that causes an increase in 21grams in some androids, causing them to become incapable of reanimation.
The protagonist, who works as a counselor on the man-made island experimental city of Zelnoa Island, searches for a cure through counseling androids.



The game progresses in a command-click style. Select "LOOK," "TALK," "THINK," "MOVE," and "DATA" commands to counsel the client. If the game progresses well, information will be added to the "KARTE" of the "DATA" command, and the story will also be affected.



In addition to the main episode, the TIP feature includes sub episodes, scientific terms, and explanations related to psychotherapy. Use it to better understand the worldview and the client, and apply it to treatment.

Please enjoy the retro near-future world colored by FM sound and 20 colors of dot picture.

data.short_description: The year is 2101, in a near future where the line between man and machine is fading. Through counseling, the film unravels the disease of inoperability caused by 21g, which has suddenly increased in some androids. It is a PC-98 respect command-click ADV with FM sound music and 20 color dots.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Win10/Win8/Win7
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 640×480
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Violence, mental anguish, death of humans and androids
